data.title: SIUE Softball Adds Three for 2025 Season
data.meta_description: EDWARDSVILLE, Ill. - SIUE softball Head Coach Ben Sorden bolstered his program's roster with the addition of three student-athletes who will join the Cougars this
data.text:
EDWARDSVILLE, Ill. - SIUE softball Head Coach Ben Sorden bolstered his program's roster with the addition of three student-athletes who will join the Cougars this fall as it prepares for the 2025 season.

The newest Cougars are Kaylin Fahy (Niles, Illinois), Gretchen Trello (Williamsville, Illinois), and Kiana Villa (Coolidge, Arizona).

Kaylin Fahy

Position: Outfield

Bats/Throws: R/R

Hometown: Niles, Illinois

Previous School: Green Bay

High School: Maine South High School

Coach Sorden on Kaylin: "We had an immediate connection with Kaylin and are excited she be joining the team. As one of the leading hitters for UW Green Bay, we look forward to the offense she brings."

Accolades: Played two seasons at Green Bay, batting .245 with 39 hits ... Appeared in 78 games and earned 64 starting assignments. Prep: Third team All-State selection in 2021 for Maine South High School ... All-Conference honors in 2021 and 2022... Central Suburban League Scholar Athlete and IHSA Scholastic Achievement Award honorees ... Led Main South to conference title in 2022 and regional titles in 2021 and 2022 ... Academic excellence in biology ... Honor roll for world cultures.

Personal: Daughter of Chrisann and Richard Fahy

Gretchen Trello

Position: Outfield/Catcher

Bats/Throws: R/R

Hometown: Williamsville, Illinois

Previous School: St. Louis CC

High School: Sacred Heart Griffin High School

Coach Sorden on Gretchen: "Gretchen could be a spark for us and we are excited that the NJCAA Region 16 Player of the Year is going to be a Cougar. At SLCC she provided consistent power at the plate and we look forward to the offense she can produce."

Accolades: 2024 NJCAA Division II third team All-American at Saint Louis Community College ... First team All-Conference pick after hitting .439 with team-leading 15 home runs and 59 runs batted in ... Led team as a sophomore in runs scored (62), hits (83), slugging percentage (.852) and doubles (23) ... 2023 Region 16 Player of the Year and All-Region team member ... Three-time All-State pick in softball at Sacred Heart Griffin High School .. Three-time All-Conference pick and three-time Academic All-Conference honoree

Personal: Daughter of Amelia and Mike Trello

Kiana Villa

Position: Pitcher

Bats/Throws: R/R

Hometown: Coolidge, Arizona

Previous School: Central Arizona CC

High School: Coolidge High School

Coach Sorden on Kiana: "KV will add experience to our young bullpen. We are happy to have a pitcher from such a historic program and we look for her to make an immediate impact with her work ethic."

Accolades: Won seven games last season for Central Arizona Community College ... Posted 4.25 earned run average last season ... Three-time All-Region pitcher at Coolidge High School ... First team Pinal Central All-County team as a senior ... Ranked No. 15 as a senior in strikeouts in Arizona Interscholastic Association softball ... 3A Central Region Player of the Year as a sophomore and first team All-State pick as a sophomore ... Member of National Honor Society and FCCLA.

Personal: Parents are Marissa Rodriguez and Michael Villa.
